about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who We Are
about.description1: We are a digital studio focused on designing and developing modern web applications with a clear goal – to help brands grow and deliver real results.
about.description2: We create products that not only look good but primarily fulfill their business purpose.
about.description3: We believe that a quality website is not just about design, but primarily about functionality, speed, and a great user experience. We specialize in complete execution from initial design to technical implementation and long-term sustainability.
about.description4: We treat every project individually. Whether it's a corporate presentation or an interactive application, we work with proven procedures that ensure speed, security, and seamless operation on all devices.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.desc: Modern websites that not only look great but actually sell.
webDev.extDesc: We don’t just make digital business cards. We build powerful business tools that turn visitors into customers. From SEO-optimized landing pages to complex PWA ecosystems.

appDev.title: App Development
appDev.desc: Digitizing your business. From simple tools to complex systems.
appDev.extDesc: When off-the-shelf solutions aren't enough, we build software tailored exactly to your processes. Robust, scalable, and secure.

aiImpl.title: AI Implementation
aiImpl.desc: Your competitors talk about AI. We deploy it to work for you.
aiImpl.extDesc: We help companies automate routines, save labor costs, and improve customer experience using artificial intelligence and automation.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Management
socialMedia.desc: Building your brand where your customers are.
socialMedia.extDesc: Social media isn't about random photo posting. It is a systematic channel for building trust and driving sales.

marketing.title: General Marketing
marketing.desc: Comprehensive strategy to get your product to people.
marketing.extDesc: We don't rely on a single channel. We combine tools to maximize your Return on Investment (ROI) and brand visibility.

droneVideo.title: Drone Filming & Editing
droneVideo.desc: A view that sells. Professional aerial footage.
droneVideo.extDesc: Drone footage adds prestige and perspective to your project that you simply can't get from the ground. Full service from flight to final edit.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Start Your Project
contact.ctaDesc: Whether you have a groundbreaking idea or need to modernize existing infrastructure, we are here for you. Get in touch and let's discuss your vision.

homeAbout.description1: We are a collective of digital architects and creative engineers. We don't just build websites; we construct immersive digital realities that elevate brands above the ordinary noise.
homeAbout.description2: We specialize in high-performance web applications, 3D interactive experiences, and futuristic branding. Our mission is to combine art and engineering into a unique, powerful expression of your identity.

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.desc: Next-gen tech stacks for speed and scale.

global.title: Global Reach
global.desc: Digital solutions that connect with audiences worldwide.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.desc: Maintainable, scalable, and built to last.

portfolio.title: Selected Work
portfolio.subtitle: Our Portfolio
portfolio.footerTagline: Every project is an opportunity to create something exceptional.

hero.description: A collection of digital experiences designed for speed, aesthetics, and maximum impact.

minar.description: Complete design and implementation of a responsive corporate website for a company specializing in building waterproofing and sales of specialized materials.
minar.role: Structure & UX Design, UI Design, Implementation, Responsiveness Testing
minar.goal: The goal was to create a modern, clear, and credible brand presentation that facilitates user orientation, clearly communicates services and products, and supports generating new inquiries.
minar.solution: The website emphasizes a clear information structure, intuitive navigation, and a consistent visual style. The solution includes a product catalog, equipment rental section, clear team presentation, and an optimized contact page with map integration. The interface is fully responsive and optimized for various devices with a focus on load speed and content readability.

berticka.description: Comprehensive design and implementation of a modern digital platform connecting the fishing community with charitable aid.
berticka.role: UX Strategy, UI Design, Frontend Implementation
berticka.goal: To create an attractive, credible, and easy-to-use website that motivates visitors to participate in competitions, facilitates team registration, and transparently communicates the purpose of the initiative. Strong visual identity supports emotions connected with being in nature.
berticka.solution: The platform is designed with a focus on performance, responsiveness, and scalability. A key element is the online registration process, which simplifies administration. The solution includes an overview of upcoming events and a partners section.

asminar.description: Comprehensive design and implementation of a modern web presentation for AS Minar – an application center specializing in professional waterproofing and insulation systems.
asminar.role: UX Structure Design, UI Design, Frontend Implementation, Responsive Tuning
asminar.goal: The project aim was to create a representative digital identity that strengthens brand credibility, clearly communicates the scope of services, and effectively supports the inquiry process. The website had to look professional while serving as a practical business tool.
asminar.solution: The website is built on clear information architecture and a distinct visual style. The key role is played by the services page with structured segments and the portfolio section for building trust. The contact page is optimized to minimize barriers with map integration and clear CTAs.

jaz.description: Design and implementation of a modern web presentation for recreational accommodation Chalupa JAZ in Bedřichov, Jizera Mountains.
jaz.role: UX Design, UI Design, Frontend Implementation, Animation
jaz.goal: To create an attractive and trustworthy digital presentation that provides visitors with key information in a clear form and supports booking decisions. Emphasis on strong visuals and emotions.
jaz.solution: The website combines interior and location photography with clearly structured content. The interface uses card layouts, subtle animations, and transparent pricing communication. Responsive design ensures comfortable viewing on all devices.

stejskal.description: Comprehensive design and implementation of a modern presentation website for a construction company with an emphasis on credibility and conversion.
stejskal.role: UI/UX Design, Frontend Development, Component Architecture
stejskal.goal: To design and develop a modern presentation website focusing on credibility, performance, and a clear conversion path. The design uses a dark industrial visual.
stejskal.solution: The website features a dynamic intro section with a 3D hero effect, clear service segmentation, and a separate realizations section. The technical solution on React + Vite ensures speed and easy maintenance.

blitzSpeed.title: Blitz Speed
blitzSpeed.subtitle: Optimized for maximum performance with 99+ Lighthouse scores.

ironcladSecurity.title: Ironclad Security
ironcladSecurity.subtitle: Enterprise-grade protection integrated into every layer of code.

modernTech.title: Modern Tech
modernTech.subtitle: Built with the latest frameworks: React, Tailwind, and Vite.

analysis.title: Analysis & Strategy
analysis.description: Mapping the digital terrain. We analyze your goals, audience, and competition to define a precise trajectory for success.

uiux.title: UI/UX Engineering
uiux.description: Architecting the experience. Wireframes turn into high-fidelity interfaces designed for maximum engagement and conversion.

development.title: Agile Development
development.description: Writing the logic. Using modern frameworks and scalable architecture, we build robust systems in fast, iterative sprints.

testing.title: Rigorous Testing
testing.description: Bulletproof code. Automated and manual testing ensures performance, security, and stability across all devices.

launch.title: Launch & Evolution
launch.description: Powering up. Deployment is just the beginning; we provide ongoing support to let your product evolve.
